name: Mollusk Mayhem
description:
Mollusk Mayhem

100% free!

Try to score as many points as you can in this fast paced, tough, yet addictive platform game for android phones and tablets!

Compete against your friends to see who can get the highest score!

Are you good enough to take on the challenge? Let's find out!

Download now direct to your android device from Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

To hear news on my upcoming games first...

Follow me on twitter: https://www.twitter.com/indievortex
